name: Cats to the Moon
description:
In cats to the moon you play as a Space Kitten Captain trying to get as many cats to the moon as you can.

Explore and find cats, when you have a few follow the arrow to the moon and drop them off. Repeat! Get as many cats as you can to the moon!

Control schemes available:

1. Keyboard/Mouse

Move: w,a,s,d / Boost: spacebar / Rotate left: left click / Rotate right: right click

2. Just Keyboard

Move: arrow keys / Boost: spacebar / Rotate left: z / Rotate right: c

3.  Controller

Move: D-pad or left stick / Boost: Square(dualshock4) X(XBOX) / Rotate left: L1, LB / Rotate right: R1, RB

Cats to the moon was made for the 48 hour Extra credits game jam.
